metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Disabled all Trusted Locations' is set to Enabled

metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Trust Access To Visual Basic Project' is set to Disabled

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'VBA Macro Notification Settings' is set to Enabled (Disable all Except Digitally Signed Macros)

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Store Macro In Personal Macro Workbook by Default' is set to Enabled
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Store Macro In Personal Macro Workbook by Default' is set to Enabled

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Turn Off File Validation' is set to Disabled
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Turn Off File Validation' is set to Disabled

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Force File Extension to Match File Type' is set to Enabled(Always match file type )
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Force File Extension to Match File Type' is set to Enabled(Always match file type )

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure' Scan Encrypted Macros in Excel Open XML Workbooks' is set to Enable (Scan encrypted macros (default))
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure' Scan Encrypted Macros in Excel Open XML Workbooks' is set to Enable (Scan encrypted macros (default))
